name: 3.4.1.31. Public Scandal

cf.path: Map Notes#/CF_SEP/PFRPG - Kingdom Building - GM Version

content: One of your leaders is implicated in a crime or an embarrassing situation, such as an affair with another leader's spouse. Infamy increases by 1. Attempt a Loyalty check. If you fail, Unrest increases by 2 and you take a -4 penalty on all Loyalty checks until the next Event phase
